name: WooProduct Discount period
author: NssTheme Team

sections.description:
If you went to create a price schedule product addon like special product sale service offer which is certain time period.
Major features in WooProduct Discount Period:

  • Shortcode options with custom query.
  • Easy edit your title and contents and images.
  • unlimited image and gallery.
  • and finally view a nice modern design..
  • It’s totally bug free and check to wp debug true.
sections.installation:
*. upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the wordpress plugins screen directly.
*. activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in wordPress
*. use the Settings->plugin Name screen to configure the plugin

Upload the WooProduct Discount period plugin to your page or create a blank templete in you theme: link this

1.0: You’re done!
